data.title: Screenings — pure
data.text:
The Martha’s Vineyard African American Film Festival

In Person Screening in Martha’s Vineyard, MA on August 9, 2021 @ 11 am during Shorts Block #13.

*Nominated for The Best Narrative Short Film Award

aGLIFF / PRISM Film Festival

In Person Screening on August 1st @ 7pm and August 4th @ 11:30am in Austin, Texas.

Virtual Screening from 9/4 - 9/6, 2021.

* Received The 2021 Queer Black Voices Award

WOMENX FILM FESTIVAL

In Person Screening at ARC - Stockton Arts Centre in North East England on August 2, 2021 @ 17:30.

Virtual Screening from August 2 - 4, 2021 for UK audiences only.

* Received The Best LGBTQ Film Award

Out On Film: Atlanta's LGBTQ Film Festival

In Person Screening Saturday, Sept. 25 at 12 pm at the Midtown Art Cinema in Atlanta, Georgia.

Shorts block: “Best of Women's Shorts”

Virtual Screening Available from September 25 - October 10, 2021.

NewFest

In Person Screening in partnership with The NYC Department of Education (screening only open to NYC students & educators) on Thursday, October 21, 2021 at 4pm at SVA Theater, 333 West 23rd Street, New York, NY 10011.

Virtual Screening Available to all from October 15 - 26, 2021. Shorts block: Queer Kid Power.

*Received the NYWIFT Grant Award

montclair FILM FESTIVAL

In Person Screening at Clairidge Cinema - Theater 1 on Saturday, October 23 at 1:30 PM in Montclair, New Jersey.

Virtual Screening Available from October 24 - 31, 2021.

Shorts block: Out Shorts

Black Love Through a Black Lens | Milwaukee film

In Person Screening on Thursday, February 10th at 6:30 PM at Lubar Cinema.

Outfest fusion film festival

In Person Screening on Tuesday, April 12th at 7pm PT at Regal LA Live in Los Angeles, CA. Shorts Block: Ophiuchus Shorts - We've Always Been Here

National Film Festival for Talented YoutH (NFFTY)

In Person Screening on Friday, April 29, 2022 12:15 PM PDT at SIFF Cinema Uptown (Theater 1) in Seattle, Washington. Shorts Block: Growth Spurts

Milwaukee Film Festival

In Person Screenings on Monday, May 2, 2022 at 9pm at The Times Cinema & on Wednesday, May 4, 2022 at 1pm at The Oriental Theatre (Abele Cinema) in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Shorts Block: BLACK LENS SHORTS — BLACK LOVE THROUGH A BLACK LENS

The future of film is female: summer filmmaker screening

In Person Screening on Tuesday, July 26, 2022 at 7pm at The Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), in New York City.

National Film Festival for Talented YoutH (NFFTY): LA POP UP

In Person Screening on Sunday, October 16, 2022 at 7pm at The Beverly Hills Fine Arts Theater in Los Angeles, CA. Shorts Block: Come As You Are.
